text: Hey everyone, I’m Brady! I’m a front end developer with a background in physics and math, and I’m interested in helping people (including myself) build intuition for physics and math concepts using accessible, interactive visuals. I finally decided to learn Julia after getting fed up with JavaScript while working on an ODE solver, and realizing that Julia solves most of the problems I ran up against. My hope is to eventually use Julia as a back end for accessible, animated learning apps in the browser.

text: Sounds like Pluto Notebooks might interest you, I think their design philosophy has very similar aims
